vote.title: Authorize an increase in the purchase amount of acquisition from Light Economic & Development, Inc., of approximately 4,140 square feet of land improved with a single-family dwelling located near the intersection of Dolphin Road and Detonte Street for the Dolphin Road from Spring Avenue to North Haskell Avenue Project - Not to exceed $82,047.00, increased from $140,000.00 ($136,124.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,876.00) to $225,000.00 ($218,171.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $6,829.00) - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($16,409.40) and Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($65,637.60)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the purchase amount of acquisition from Light Economic & Development, Inc., of approximately 4,140 square feet of land improved with a single-family dwelling located near the intersection of Dolphin Road and Detonte Street for the Dolphin Road from Spring Avenue to North Haskell Avenue Project - Not to exceed $82,047.00, increased from $140,000.00 ($136,124.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,876.00) to $225,000.00 ($218,171.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $6,829.00) - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($16,409.40) and Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($65,637.60)
